parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. The server checks whether a request that uses the same client token has been received. If a request that uses the same client token has been received, the server returns the same request result as the previous request.

parameters.name: Logistics
parameters.description: The logistics address of this order. This parameter is generally valid for physical orders.

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description:
The subscription duration. Unit: month. The value must be an integral multiple of 12.

>  This parameter is required if you create a subscription instance.

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description: The code of the service to which the instance belongs. You can query the service code by calling the **QueryProductList** operation or viewing **Codes of Alibaba Cloud Services**.

parameters.name: RenewPeriod
parameters.description:
The auto-renewal period. Unit: month.

>  This parameter is required if the **RenewalStatus** parameter is set to **AutoRenewal**.

parameters.name: RenewalStatus
parameters.description:
The renewal method. Valid values:

*   AutoRenewal: The instance is automatically renewed.
*   ManualRenewal: The instance is manually renewed.

Default value: ManualRenewal.

parameters.name: SubscriptionType
parameters.description:
The billing method. Valid values:

*   Subscription: the subscription billing method.
*   PayAsYouGo: the pay-as-you-go billing method.
